name: package-manager-tools
description: A set of tools to help with package managers

PackageManagerTools.hideMissingAnnotatio.markdownDescription: Hide the *' Generate Annotation files'* status bar warning.

PackageManagerTools.hideInstallAllButton.markdownDescription: Hide the *'Install All'* status bar button.

PackageManagerTools.hideRemoveButton.markdownDescription: Hide the *'Remove Package'* status bar submenu.

PackageManagerTools.hideListButton.markdownDescription: Hide the *'List Packages'* status bar submenu.

PackageManagerTools.hideVersionButton.markdownDescription: Hide the *'Get Version'* status bar submenu.

PackageManagerTools.hideUpdateVersionBut.markdownDescription: Hide the *'Update App Version'* status bar button.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
